alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 2:23PM PST until December 30 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains and Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Roadways that may be affected by accumulating snow include Highway 33 and Lockwood Valley Road in Ventura County.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
